title: Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Tokyo
description: Experience the height of Japanese hospitality at the five-star Capitol Hotel Tokyu, located in the heart of Tokyo’s Chiyoda district. One of the country’s finest hotel brands, the Capitol offers luxe rooms with vast city views, fine-dining restaurants, a rejuvenating spa and first-class fitness facilities. Included in your escape is a daily breakfast for two, JPY5,000 hotel credit, a daily cocktail per person and a guaranteed leisurely late 1pm check-out.
